body:
On Fri,21.May.10, 12:22:22, peasthope@shaw.ca wrote: 
> From: Andrei Popescu 
> Date: Fri, 21 May 2010 22:03:19 +0300 
> > # echo 'APT::Default-Release "squeeze";' >> /etc/apt/apt.conf 
> 
> Somehow I had the impression that the order of the 
> sources would prioritize them. 
 
Yes (or at least that's what the manpage says), but only when you have 
the same version of a package. 
 
Regards, 
Andrei 
--

subject: Re: Re (7): xorg-server failing on IBM NetVista with Intel 82815   video
